From the brand

AOOG has always insisted on providing cost-effective car seat covers. Not only does it provide superior protection and meets versatile needs, it also adds comfort to your drive.Amazing details, clever design. Each AOOG seat cover has its own set of interior styles, details and premium materials. Discover the saddle that fits your vehicle.

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

F150 Leather Seat Covers

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: High-Grade Leatherette materials Protect the original car seat from damage, Durable Wear-Resistant Waterproof Easy to Clean. Equipped with thick, premium High-Density Foam to create top resilience for maximum comfort during your drive.
PROTECTS & LUXURIOUS: These are the perfect seat covers for your car. Our seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle. High-quality artificial leather and excellent appearance design, also refreshing the look of your interior.
STYLE DESIGN: Our universal fit seat covers with a unique visual design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags. The anchor attached to the elastic strap can also provide firm reinforcement.
EASY TO INSTALL: For your convenience, installation instructions are included in the product package, and we also provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles, including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. If you are not sure whether the vehicle is suitable for you, please contact us in time. Our customer service team will always online to assist you.

Read more

Details:
  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort.
  • Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Sideless design compatible with side armrests and airbags.
  • Easy to Install within minutes.

AOOG Leather Car Seat Covers Set – Waterproof Universal Car Seat Protector

AOOG Car Seat Covers can protect the original seat, give your car seat a new look.

These are the perfect seat covers, the best investment for your new vehicle, We design our products to ensure comfort is our top priority.

  • High-quality leatherette to provide valuable protection and luxurious comfort for almost any car or truck.
  • The entire seat, backrest and headrest are lined with high-density foam to provide maximum comfort during long-distance travel and daily commuting.
  • What’s In The Package?
  • 2 pcs Front Seat Covers + 2 pcs Front Headrest Covers.
  • Adjustable Back Seat Covers (for full set only).
  • A Hardware Bag of Steel Hooks and Round Plates for Install.
  • An Installation Manual.

Read more

Airbag Compatible

The airbag has enough room to stretch and will never be blocked. The front seat back has pockets for the things you want to put.

High-Quality Material

AOOG Seat Covers are made of multiple layers of high-quality materials to provide maximum comfort during your driving.

Breathable Holes

The main part of AOOG Seat Covers has Breathable Holes to ensure breathability during use and increase your comfortable experience

Five Colors

We provide a variety of colors for your choice

item.title: Lusso Gear Dog Car Seat Cover for Back Seat, Protects from Scratches, Scuffs, Shedding, Mud, & More, 100% Waterproof, Non-Slip Cover Stays Securely in Place, Fits Your Car, Truck, & SUV (Gray)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)



Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:31 UTC – Details)



【Memory Foam】Made of pure memory foam that adapts to your curves, provides superior comfort and helps with muscle fatigue. The premium memory foam never loses its shape and slowly rebounds to original shape after use.
【Friendly Design】Anti-slip rubber bottom prevents need for frequent readjustment. Built-in handle for easy portability. Removable cover makes cleaning easy. Additional mid-cover fabric to protect core foam. Breathable mesh cover allows air to circulate and prevents heat from collecting in the cushion.
【Ergonomic Design】 The ergonomically designed “U” shaped cushion helps to increase blood flow and support good gesture. Helps with muscle fatigue, leg tightness, and hamstring soreness. Popular with people who sit for more than 8 hours a day.
【Pain Relief Cushion】Place on any chair to provide extra support to your body to offload pressure on your spine, back, and sciatic nerve. Effectively relieve back, coccyx, sciatica, tailbone pain.
【Work with Any Chair】This ergonomic seat cushion provides comfort for people who sit in chairs and face screens all day. Great for office work, play games, watch movies, etc. If you travel by car, train or plane, but feel uncomfortable with the seat, this portable cushion will be your best travel partner. Bring extra comfort to your office, car, or chair!

Pleasant to hold – our original foam handset cover provides a soft non-slip surface & comfy hold for those with grip impairments such as arthritic hands. The ideal landline phones for seniors.
Never miss a call – extra loud phone (80 dB+) with ringer and handset volume control. Flashing light indicates incoming calls. Great amplified phones for hearing impaired seniors.
Make calls fast – use memory keys to easily call loved ones or emergency SOS number. Security for seniors who have dementia. The big number buttons are great for visually impaired elderly.
Keep it simple – memory keys are straightforward to program and easy to use; dial telephone number with one touch. Our best landline phone for seniors and top in dementia products.
Our promise to you – we are so confident in the premium quality of our senior phone that we offer a manufacturers guarantee; if you are unhappy with your home telephone we will replace it.

Warranty & Support

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. About TCHDIO

TCHDIO is dedicated to developing various kinds of premium and practical rugs, offering diverse rugs such as kitchen mats, outdoor carpets, and bathroom mats that are practical for people’s daily life.

We always believe top-line quality products and trustworthy manufacturers are the most critical to building a reliable brand.

Christmas Front Doormat: This lovely holiday doormat which includes Santa Claus, elk, and snow flowers, can be seamlessly integrated into any existing decoration, creating a homely atmosphere. Adding a different brilliance to your porch
Wear Resistant Surface: The texture of the surface helps capture dirt and debris. Thus, this outdoor welcome mat can effectively absorb dust, and stains from shoes. Premium material makes this mat nonslip, nonfading, non-falling off, water absorption, extremely durable, and lasting
Low Profile: 0.4IN thickness of this Merry Christmas doormat provides a low profile to prevent tripping. Suitable for external doors or entrances, for example, living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, bedroom, garden, garage, corridor, nursery, office, and restaurant
Easy to Clean: Shake or vacuum the Christmas outside door mat to keep it clean. Machine washable will save you more time with this Christmas outdoor welcome mat
Perfect Size: 17″x30″ front door Christmas mat allows decent coverage for the entryway which is a very suitable size for entrances. This will be a perfect welcome mat for the coming festival

item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.99 - $6.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:51:15 UTC – Details)



Excellent Shape and Size : A spot-on size is really important, our mouse pad measures approximately 9.4 x 8.3 inches(L X W), 0.9 inch thick. It fit for almose all kind of Mouses. You can move the mouse around easily and the pad shapes it well. Moreover, the reinforced edges can efficiently prevent deformation and damage to guarantee long time use.
Environmental Material : Made of soft smooth breathable material and non-deformable momory form, it is no-toxic, no any chemicals safe to use. More important, unlike other moused pads on the market, our mouse pads have no any bad smells!
Endless Comfortness : Applies non-slip PU rubber base, this mouse pad will firmly grasp your desk without any chance of sliding or unwanted movement for the mouse pad, so you can better focus your attention when working or studying.
Protects Your Wrists : With raised ergonomic soft memory form design, it will provide good touch and effective support to your wrist. Keep arms, wrists, and hands from getting sore while using the computer, maximum reduce wrist stress and tiredness.
